item.description:
RAWpalooza: 2012 RAW FOOD WORLD SUMMIT is A *FREE* TELE-SUMMIT featuring over 40 World-Class-Leaders in the Raw Food and Conscious Living Movement. You are invited to a FULL WEEK of incredible interviews with the leading minds in raw food and conscious living starting on Monday, January 23rd. You can see the amazing roster of thought leaders lending their inspiration and expertise for this event at http://nanacast.com/vp/105648/258745/.

The event is *FREE* and jam-packed with incredible interviews throughout each day. Interviews are being conducted by Steve Prussack, host of Raw Vegan Radio. You can look at the line-up at http://nanacast.com/vp/105648/258745/.

Feel free to register today. You will discover an incredible amount of knowledge during http://nanacast.com/vp/105648/258745/.
item.name: RAWpalooza: 2012 RAW FOOD WORLD SUMMIT *FREE* TELE-SUMMIT
